thread.section_title: SkyLux Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SkyLux Travel | www.skyluxtravel.com
thread.title: Mr. David Houston
thread.title_full: SkyLux Travel reviewed by Mr. David Houston

author: Mr. David Houston
title: Mr. David Houston
text: Great prices for international first class. However, you need to be aware that the super deal tickets do not accrue frequent flier miles not contribute to the passenger's elite status. If that is important, purchasing a regular business class ticket may only be a couple hundred dollars more expensive than using the service. I look forward to seeing how this first class compares.
